name: 7zip
description: Simple script to use exceptional 7zip compressor in your build
author: Gian Maria Ricci
helpMarkDown: This task simply invokes 7zip command line

inputs.name: compress
inputs.label: Compress
inputs.helpMarkDown: True if you want to compress, false if you want to uncompress

inputs.name: source
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source folder you want to compress

inputs.name: destination
inputs.label: Destination file
inputs.helpMarkDown: File name of the resulting 7zip file. If file ends with zip, standard zip format will be used.
